Q_NAME: Minimum sum of two numbers formed from digits of an array
Q_DESC:
Given an array of digits (values are from 0 to 9), find the minimum possible sum of two numbers formed from digits of the array. All digits of given array must be used to form the two numbers.
Input:
The first line of input contains an integer N denoting the size of the array. Next line of each test contains N space seperated integers denoting the elements of the array.

Output:
For each test case output a single line containing the required sum.
